mapper.insert: insert into user2(user_num, user_id, user_password, user_email, user_email_key, user_jobgroup, user_workspace) values ('user'||TO_CHAR(USER_NUMseq.nextval), #{user_id},#{user_password},#{user_email},#{user_email_key},#{user_jobgroup},#{user_workspace})
mapper.select: select user_id as username, user_password as password, enabled, authority from user2 where user_id=#{user_id}
select count(*) from user2 where user_id=#{user_id} and enabled=1 and authority='ROLE_USER'
select user_id from user2 where user_num = (select post_usernum from post where post_num = #{post_num})
select user_num from user2 where user_id = #{user_id}
